Pyramid Consulting: Senior PHP(Magento/Drupal) Developer

05 June 2012

Responsibilities:</strong>

Work as Senior Software Developer in Web-based application projects in PHP technology:
• Analyze system requirements
• Participate in system design and implementation.
• Perform as a key member in technical problem resolution in projects with Team Leaders
• Can play the role of a Team Leader to manage several developers in projects.
• Research and sharpen the technical skills
• Coach for junior developers

Requirements:</strong>

• 3+ years of web industry experience
• Strong experience with some of frameworks/CMSs
- E-commerce: Magento, Prestashop (Expertise in Magento is a huge advantage)
- CMS/Portal: Drupal, Joomla, Wordpress (Expertise in Drupal is a huge advantage)
- Frameworks: Symfony, Zend, Yii, CakePHP
• Well equipped knowledge with OOP, Design Patterns, Web services (REST, SOAP), Prototols (HTTP(S), FTP, SMTP, POP, SSL…)
• Solid knowledge of AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Mysql database
• Expertise in Linux and *NIX command line will be advantaged
• Expertise in Web security (Injection, XSS, CSRF, Misconfigurations …)
• Familiarity with SVN source control, web servers (WAMP, LAMP)
• Good practices in Web 2.0 and Social networking (FB, Gigya, Twitter, Myspace, Youtube) are benefits
• Must be independent, responsible, self-motivated, with ability to learn and achieve superior results.
• Good English and Aptitude to quick research new technologies
• Additional knowledge in JAVA, .NET is a plus.

Location:</strong> Ho Chi Minh City

Company information:</strong>

Pyramid Consulting is an International Web Agency offering Web-based, Multimedia and Wireless/SMS development services for Europe, North America and APAC clients who are the top International Interactive Marketing Agencies or Enterprise clients, founded since 1999 in Brussels, Belgium (Europe).

Pyramid Consulting Vietnam is the offshore Development Center of Pyramid Consulting Group, started since 2001, providing Online & Mobile development outsourcing services to world-wide customers. Pyramid Consulting Vietnam is currently one of top 3 largest Web development firms in Vietnam and is the only one serving online interactive marketing & e-business industry.

With 10 years of evolution and around more than 250 members, Pyramid Consulting is partner of the top International Interactive Marketing Communication Agencies in Europe (Belgium, France, Holland, UK), North America (Canada, United States) and APAC (Singapre, Hongkong, Australia, Vietnam), such as Publicis Moderm, MRM Worldwide, BBDO proximity, Ogilvy Interactive, McCann, FullSix, YellowPepper, etc.

The company is invested by IDG Ventures.

We offer a friendly, creative and cooperative workplace. Salary is kept competitive in the market.

Join and enrich your values at Pyramid Consulting Vietnam!
